pages.title: Quark
pages.text: Quark is a fully modular mod with the objective of improving the vanilla gameplay experience. In other words, I would call it 'what I would add if I was hired at mojang - the mod'. Modules can be turned off and all features can be turned off individually. Some even have more in-depth configs.$(br2)$(l:https://quark.vazkii.net/#features)Quark Features List$(/l)
